DOC.brief_summary: The study aim : Investigating impact phosphorus ingestion DIT lean obese subject consume high carbohydrate meal . Investigating impact phosphorus ingestion DIT lean obese subject consume high protein-low phosphorus meal .
DOC.brief_title: The Role Phosphorus Diet Induced Thermogenesis ( DIT ) Both Lean Obese Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: Subject advice take weight maintenance diet contain least 250-300g carbohydrate per day 3 day study day also he/she ask avoid intense physical activity day day test . Overnight fast subject ( > 8 hour ) request attend testing room around 8:00 . The investigator take anthropometric measurement ( weight , height , waist circumference ) determine blood glucose . A crossover design study use subject undertake 2 3 session random order 2 3 different day separate minimum one week . The difference session ingestion placebo ( 4 tablet ) phosphorus ( 4 tablet , contain 125mgof phosphorus ) tablets appropriate meal . Specific Aim 1 : The impact phosphorus ingestion DIT lean obese subject consume high carbohydrate meal ( Table 1 : Meal 1 ) . This divide two experiment : Experiment 1.1 : The impact phosphorus ingestion DIT lean subject consume high carbohydrate meal ( 16 subject ) . In experiment , overnight fast lean subject ( > 8 hour ) request attend testing room around 8:00 . Anthropometric measurement ( weight , height , waist circumference ) take , rest 30 min , measure rest energy expenditure ( REE ) 30 min , ingest meal appropriate supplement measure postprandial energy expenditure ( PEE ) 4 hour ( see figure 3 ) . In experiment , subject undertake 3 session random order 3 different day separate minimum one week . Session 1 : Ingestion phosphorus tablet ( 4 tablet ) alone . No meal . Needed determine impact phosphorus alone DIT Session 2 : Ingestion phosphorus tablet ( 4 tablet ) high carbohydrate meal ( table1 : Meal 1 ) . Session 3 : Ingestion placebo tablet ( 4 tablet ) high carbohydrate meal ( table 1 : Meal 1 ) . Experiment 1.2 : The impact phosphorus ingestion DIT lean subject consume high carbohydrate meal ( 16 subject ) . In experiment , overnight fast obese subject ( > 8 hour ) request attend testing room around 8:00 . Anthropometric measurement ( weight , height , waist circumference ) take , rest 30 min , measure rest REE 30 min , ingest meal appropriate supplement measure PEE 4 hour ( see figure 3 ) . In experiment , subject undertake 3 session random order 3 different day separate minimum one week . Session 1 : Ingestion phosphorus tablet ( 4 table ) alone . No meal . Needed determine impact phosphorus alone DIT Session 2 : Ingestion phosphorus tablet ( 4 table ) high carbohydrate meal ( Table 1 : Meal 1 ) . Session 3 : Ingestion placebo tablet ( 4 table ) high carbohydrate meal ( Table 1 : Meal 1 ) . Specific Aim 2 : The impact phosphorus ingestion DIT lean obese subject consume high protein-low phosphorus meal ( table 1 : Meal 2 ) . This divide two experiment : Experiment 2.1 : The impact phosphorus ingestion DIT lean obese subject consume high protein-low phosphorus meal ( 16 subject ) . In experiment , overnight fast lean subject ( > 8 hour ) request attend testing room around 8:00 . Anthropometric measurement ( weight , height , waist circumference ) take , rest 30 min , measure REE 30 min , ingest meal appropriate supplement measure PEE 4 hour ( see figure 3 ) . In experiment , subject undertake 2 session random order 2 different day separate minimum one week . Session 1 : Ingestion phosphorus tablet ( 4 tablet ) high protein meal ( table1 : Meal 2 ) . Session 2 : Ingestion placebo tablet ( 4 tablet ) high protein meal ( table 1 : Meal 2 ) . Experiment 2.2 : The impact phosphorus ingestion DIT lean obese subject consume high protein-low phosphorus meal ( 16 subject ) . In experiment , overnight fast obese subject ( > 8 hour ) request attend testing room around 8:00 . Anthropometric measurement ( weight , height , waist circumference ) take , rest 30 min , measure REE 30 min , ingest meal appropriate supplement measure PEE 4 hour ( see figure 3 ) . Urine sample experimental period collect . In experiment , subject undertake 2 session random order 2 different day separate minimum one week . Session 1 : Ingestion phosphorus tablet ( 4 tablet ) high protein meal ( table1 : Meal 2 ) . Session 2 : Ingestion placebo tablet ( 4 tablet ) high protein meal ( table 1 : Meal 2 ) .
